channel.title: GazaaScape (Apply Now!)
channel.description:
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2hn7z3a.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Hey guys and I'm back after the summer holidays and school is back again :/. Unfortunately. So after my successful release of my GazaaScape 562 (Loading 604). I decided to go a little bit further. I made all RSPS's myself and I get bored. And I also promised all of you for this project, I have already completed half of it but it still needs some descent work![/b][/u]
Forums: http://gazaascape.forumfree.co.uk/
[u]Some of my previous work:[/u] http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,494523.0.html
[b]The server I want to make will be based on the exact same thing, Same NPC etc, But just changing the home or changing staff location, or changing Emotes and also adding custom items. And much much more. Hopefully try to fit in some quests depending on how well we work.
Now we will all be using a program most people are familiar with, called "Dropbox" Now if you're not familiar with this program don't hesitate as it's very very simple to use and you'll get into it in no time. [/b]
Now I have many Images ready to be uploaded which I will do later, So anyway lets cut to the important part. I'll need the following
[b]Applications:[/b]
- Beta Tester [0/12] - Programmer/Source Coder [1/4] - Client Coder [0/2] - Gfx Artist [0/2] - Trailer/Video Specialist [0/2] - Graphic Desiner (Banners Etc) [0/2] - Forum/Webdeveloper [1/1]
[b]Application Form[/b]
Name: Msn: Skype: Experience: Age: Apply For: Why Choose us: What Timezone:
[b]Server Feature's:[/b]
[b]Red = Yet to do Green = Done Orange = Started
- Dungonering Minigame - Working Summoning With Following Beasts - Bosses: Corporeal Beast, Tornemented Demons etc. - Working Minigames - Perfect Hybriding [For PK] - 21 Skill Are Working 100% - Donor Points System - Grand Exchange - At least 75% of the map and it's objects working - Own clan citadels - Clue scrolls - Familiars help in combat! - FULL HD - Extremes/Supers - Multi barraging - Auto cache downloader (Saved heck loads of time) - All Specs working - Player owned homes - Desert waterskin drinking - All Non member quests (Moving on to Members later) - Realistic NPC hits - Curses - Achievement Diaries - All NPC in their original areas - Future update list
AND SO MUCH MORE! [/b]
For this project I need mostly people that can work in British Daylight times (They don't [b]HAVE[/b] to)
For further enquiries please feel free to contact me at:
Skype: Snakeflesh Msn : Galexy_12@hotmail.com (I know galaxy is spelt wrong, I made it when I was 7 lol)
Or more simply PM me on here!
Thank you very much

item.title: GazaaScape (Apply Now!)
item.dc:creator: @Chrisl1924 Chrisl1924
item.description:
@Chrisl1924 wrote:

Name: Chris
Msn: Clemke1924@gmail.com
Skype: Clemke1924
Experience: 4 years of html, 3+ of css, as well as some javascript (different than java) and at least 2 years with various forum software. (www.expendusx.tk and http://s1.zetaboards.com/sacredskillers/index/)
Age: 15
Apply For: Forum and Web Developer
Why Choose us: It looks like something that will continue, not just dry up in a few weeks. I love the content, as well as your past releases.
What Timezone: US Central (Wisconsin)
It looks good! I hope I can contribute in any way possible!

Read full topic

item.title: GazaaScape (Apply Now!)
item.dc:creator: @turretscape turretscape
item.description:
@turretscape wrote:

[quote=“Gazascape, post:1, topic:417221”]

Hey guys and I’m back after the summer holidays and school is back again :/. Unfortunately. So after my successful release of my GazaaScape 562 (Loading 604). I decided to go a little bit further. I made all RSPS’s myself and I get bored. And I also promised all of you for this project, I have already completed half of it but it still needs some descent work!

Some of my previous work: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,494523.0.html

[b]The server I want to make will be based on the exact same thing, Same NPC etc, But just changing the home or changing staff location, or changing Emotes and also adding custom items. And much much more. Hopefully try to fit in some quests depending on how well we work.

Now we will all be using a program most people are familiar with, called “Dropbox” Now if you’re not familiar with this program don’t hesitate as it’s very very simple to use and you’ll get into it in no time.
[/b]

Now I have many Images ready to be uploaded which I will do later, So anyway lets cut to the important part. I’ll need the following

           [b]Applications:[/b]

  • Beta Tester [0/12]

  • Programmer [0/4]

  • Client Coder [0/2]

  • Gfx Artist [0/2]

  • Trailer/Video Specialist [0/2]

  • Graphic Desiner (Banners Etc) [0/2]

             [b]Application Form[/b]

Name:
Msn:
Skype:
Experience:
Age:
Apply For:
Why Choose us:
What Timezone:

                   [b]Server Feature's:[/b]

[b]Red = Yet to do
Green = Done
Orange = Started

  • Dungonering Minigame
  • Working Summoning With Following Beasts
  • Bosses: Corporeal Beast, Tornemented Demons etc.
  • Working Minigames
  • Perfect Hybriding [For PK]
  • 21 Skill Are Working 100%
  • Donor Points System
  • Grand Exchange
  • At least 75% of the map and it’s objects working
  • Own clan citadels
  • Clue scrolls
  • Familiars help in combat!
  • FULL HD
  • Extremes/Supers
  • Multi barraging
  • Auto cache downloader (Saved heck loads of time)
  • All Specs working
  • Player owned homes
  • Desert waterskin drinking
  • All Non member quests (Moving on to Members later)
  • Realistic NPC hits
  • Curses
  • Achievement Diaries
  • All NPC in their original areas
  • Future update list

AND SO MUCH MORE!
[/b]

For this project I need mostly people that can work in British Daylight times (They don’t HAVE to)

For further enquiries please feel free to contact me at:

Skype: Snakeflesh
Msn : Galexy_12@hotmail.com (I know galaxy is spelt wrong, I made it when I was 7 lol)

Or more simply PM me on here!

Thank you very much[/quote]

Name: Kamil
Msn: kamzuk1998@hotmail.co.uk
Skype: None
Experience: 4 years of coding (Mainly 562+ now)
Age: 13
Apply For: Java Coder / Forum Developer
Why Choose us: Because , your past releases were very good… now i want to join
What Timezone: GMT +1
